text: Henning Carlsen (4 June 1927 â€“ 30 May 2014) was a Danish movie director, screenwriter, and producer. He is known for directing Hunger and People Meet and Sweat Music Fills the Heart. He won two Bodil Awards. Carlsen died in Copenhagen, Denmark from natural causes, aged 86. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Danish movie directors Category:Danish movie producers Category:Danish screenwriters
title: Henning Carlsen
